price: 60. Bosembo ezali nde epai na Nkolo nayo. Kasi kozala te elongo na baye bazali na koyimayima.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
